taskDescription: Prostaglandin F2α, a hormone that causes uterine contraction during childbirth, has the following structure. Are the two hydroxyl groups (–OH) on the cyclopentane ring cis or trans to each other? What about the two carbon chains attached to the ring?
detailedSolution: The two hydroxyl groups are cis. The two side chains are trans.
